info.name: EmployeesApi
info.description:
# Introduction
This rest api exposes the necessary operations to perform get, create, update and delete Employees to a no-sql database

# Overview
This api is a serverless aproach deployed on aws, it uses apigateway, lambda functions written in Java8 and uses dynamodb as de database storage.
All the resources are managed on the scenario of infraestructure as code IaC, on a cloudformation stack
 
# Authentication
This api is for now public to use

# Error Codes
Http standard code errors, if something goes wrong a message shows up to help

 - 200 ok operations
 - 201 created operation
 - 400 bad request situations
 - 401 unauthorized (delete action)
 - 404 resource not found...

# Rate limit
By default, API Gateway limits the steady-state request rate to 10,000 requests per second (rps). It limits the burst (that is, the maximum bucket size) to 5,000 requests across all APIs within an AWS account. In API Gateway, the burst limit corresponds to the maximum number of concurrent request submissions that API Gateway can fulfill at any moment without returning 429 Too Many Requests error responses.

item.name: employees

request.description: Returns a Json array of ACTIVE employees on the database
Write the proporcioned employee json representation to the databse
The parameters must be equals as the returned ones
To update an element you must fully provided
A valid json structure its needed
